title: Crawler, Scraper and Google spreadsheet codes expert needed to find new models and products to add to our catalogue
snippet:
Hello,
we are looking for a Crawler and Scraper expert to find new models and products, we need to crawl some websites like Amazon or other competitors to find new models to add to our catalogue and list.

These are the MUST HAVE:

-Advanced and Professional crawler software experience and knowledge
-Advanced Excel experience
-Advanced Google spreadsheet experience

Without these 3 points please do not apply.


-Experience in Notebook and electronics world will be well considered.



Thanks
